summary: An ordinance authorizing the dismissal of the suit by the City of Seattle, for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property for the laying off, opening, widening and establishing of Erskine Way, and certain other avenues and streets, as provided in Ordinance No. 45322, Cause No. 173709, of the Superior Court of the State of Washington in and for King County, insofar as the same affects said property.
